ai-tha-ap515:1.1_0: Oh, when will I live serene,
ai-tha-ap515:1.2_0: to the branch of the gods.
ai-tha-ap515:1.4_0: Then the Kosambī went to Kosambī.
ai-tha-ap515:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap515:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap515:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kosambi.
ai-tha-ap515:7.1_0: Third the third rainy season residence at Kosambī, and third Elders
